name: BEST WESTERN Royal Plaza Hotel & Trade Center

reviews.text: I'd stayed at this hotel a few times in the last 3 years, and, while it was never pristine, it was usually clean and seemed well-run. My experience during my last stay tells me that something is definitely wrong at this hotel now...
reviews.title: Going Downhill Fast
Overpriced, enormous, stuffy rooms, small worn down pool
reviews.text: The first room I was given was not clean - the beds were made, but there were crumbs/dirt all over the carpet - obviously had not been vacuumed. They gave me another room, and, while it was still dingy and didn't smell that great, I couldn't tell that an attempt had not been made to clean it, so I accepted it. The beds were as hard as a rock in both rooms.

reviews.title: Pleasent Stay
reviews.text: The breakfast buffet the next morning was not very good - I'm not sure how they did it, but the make-your-own waffle I had was _sour_ - I'm hoping it was an excess of buttermilk in the batter, and not a result of the batter having been left out all week. Even though the breakfast was included with my room, I declined it the second morning.
We spent 4 nights here as part of a packaged tour of New England in the Fall anf found it to be adequate but nothing out of the ordinary.
reviews.title: OK but eat in the Longhorn steakhouse nearby

reviews.text: The rooms were a reasonable size and we had plenty of hot water in a good shower. Breakfasts were an endurance test and we had to queue every morning for a table. It was impossible to get to the one toaster so I gave up. Staff were helpful at all times but the layout of the dining room is just daft!
reviews.title: Basic Business Hotel

reviews.text: A 5 minute walk away we found a Longhorn steak house - we had not been to one before - and we enjoyed delicious steaks and seafood there every night in a bustling jolly atmosphere. The members of our group who dined in the Best Western itself had mixed reviews of the food ranging from good to awful but we did not dine there ourselves.
reviews.title: Rooms ok, service medium

reviews.text: Stayed here coming out of Boston to attend a biz conference at the hotel. Very easy to get to, directions on web site were perfect.
reviews.title: I would stay again
clean and friendly
reviews.text: Easy parking. Food during conference was very good. Room was just OK. While clean it could certainly use some updating. Temperature control impossible to figure out. Wi-fi worked well.
